ISSUE.TITLE: Filter by store isn't working correctly in admin area
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 + Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. open the backend 2. go to the categories list page 3. try filtering by store It will not work, as `showHidden` is set to true, and the store filtering currently only applies when `showHidden` = false. This kinda makes the store filtering selector on the category page useless. See here for 4.60.x https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/5cc7475339a6c4fcad81ecc2b0dea8c06d15dc06/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Catalog/CategoryService.cs#L246-L254 See here for 4.50.x https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/5496cc30549b562cd0d87785ea5d77ab6cfb5130/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Catalog/CategoryService.cs#L250-L257
